editor-searchable-dropdowns.name: Searchable dropdowns
editor-searchable-dropdowns.description: Allows you to search block dropdowns.

forum-search.name: Forum search
forum-search.description: Adds a post search bar to the forums. Uses ScratchDB for information.

discuss-button.name: Customizable navigation bar
discuss-button.description: Choose a list of links to be displayed in the navigation bar.

editor-stepping.name: Running block border
editor-stepping.description: Adds a colored highlight to the blocks that are currently being executed in a project.

image-uploader.name: Forums image uploader
image-uploader.description: Adds a button to directly upload and insert images into forum posts.

forum-time-zones.name: Local timezone on forums
forum-time-zones.description: Uses your local time zone for displaying post dates and times on the forums.

remove-sprite-confirm.name: Sprite deletion confirmation
remove-sprite-confirm.description: Asks if you're sure when deleting a sprite inside a project.

true-youtube-links.name: True forums YouTube links
true-youtube-links.description: Replaces links to the embedded site with real YouTube links.

progress-bar.name: Project progress bar
progress-bar.description: Adds a progress bar for loading and saving projects.

settings.name: Show progress bar at top of page

remix-tree-button.name: Remix tree button
remix-tree-button.description: Brings back the remix tree button to project pages, next to the Copy Link button.

bitmap-copy.name: Bitmap images copying
bitmap-copy.description: Allows you to copy a bitmap image from the costume editor into the system clipboard, so that you can paste it in other websites or software.

info.text: "Right click â†’ copy" is not supported. You must press Ctrl+C while a bitmap image is selected.

more-links.name: More links
more-links.description: Adds links for URLs pointing outside scratch.mit.edu.

youtube-fullscreen.name: YouTube full screen
youtube-fullscreen.description: Enables the full screen button in Scratch's YouTube video player.

full-signature.name: Full areas
full-signature.description: Shows the full content of areas with limited height, such as user signatures on the forums and What I've been doing on profiles, by making them resizable or scrollable.

settings.name: Show scroll for "What I've been doing"

60fps.name: 60FPS project player mode
60fps.description: Alt+Click the green flag to toggle 60FPS.

info.text: Projects will run twice as fast at 60FPS, because they typically run at 30FPS.

search-profile.name: Search profile
search-profile.description: Allows you to go to a user's profile when you search their username.

better-emojis.name: Better emojis
better-emojis.description: Replaces the emojis in comments on the website with improved vector designs.

last-edit-tooltip.name: Shared/edited dates tooltip
last-edit-tooltip.description: Hover over a project's share date for information on when exactly it was shared and last edited.

semicolon.name: Semicolon glitch
semicolon.description: Adds the semicolon glitch back to Scratch.

infinite-scroll.name: Infinite scrolling
infinite-scroll.description: Allow for scrolling on different parts of the site without having to click to "load more".

mouse-pos.name: Mouse position
mouse-pos.description: Displays your mouse x/y position above the stage in the editor.

clones.name: Clone counter
clones.description: Adds a counter above the stage in the editor which shows the total amount of clones.

exact-count.name: Show exact count
exact-count.description: Shows the exact count for user and studio info. Uses ScratchDB for forums information.

cat-blocks.name: Cat blocks
cat-blocks.description: Brings back editor cat hat blocks from April Fools 2020.

info.text: The "Watch mouse cursor" option may impact performance when the editor is open.

editor-messages.name: Messages in editor
editor-messages.description: Displays your message count in the editor menu bar.

pause.name: Pause button
pause.description: Adds a pause button next to the green flag.

resizable-comment-input.name: Resizable comment input
resizable-comment-input.description: Makes the comment input box vertically resizable in Scratch 3.0-styled pages.

animated-thumb.name: Thumbnails setter
animated-thumb.description: Adds a button to the bottom-right of the project page to set the thumbnail of your project to any image (including gifs).

live-featured-project.name: Live featured project
live-featured-project.description: Shows an interactive featured project, directly from the user's profile. Based on the implementation in Mega Scratch Userscript.

curator-link.name: Front page curator link
curator-link.description: Makes the username of the front page curator a clickable link to their profile.

feature-unshared.name: Feature unshared projects
feature-unshared.description: Allows you to choose unshared projects after clicking "change featured project" in your profile.

project-notes-tabs.name: Project notes tabs
project-notes-tabs.description: Creates tabs on a project page for the "Instructions" section and the "Notes and Credits" section.

block-switching.name: Block switching
block-switching.description: Right click on a block to switch it to a related block.

settings.name: Show option to change block to self

potentialValues.name: Arguments in all custom blocks in sprite

my-ocular.name: ocular integration
my-ocular.description: Shows ocular statuses and forum post reactions. Uses my-ocular.jeffalo.net to obtain data.

settings.name: Show reaction buttons and "View on ocular" link

mediarecorder.name: Project video recorder
mediarecorder.description: Adds a "start recording" button to the editor menu bar that allows you to record the project's stage.

color-picker.name: Hex color picker
color-picker.description: Adds hex code inputs to color pickers.

onion-skinning.name: Onion skinning
onion-skinning.description: Shows transparent overlays of previous or next costumes when editing a costume. Controlled by buttons under the costume editor by the zoom buttons.

better-quoter.name: Better forum quoter
better-quoter.description: Select text in a forum post and click quote in the bottom right corner to only quote the selected text.

info.text: The BBCode may not be 100% accurate. To get fully accurate quotes, quote as normal and delete any parts that you don't need.

data-category-tweaks-v2.name: Data category tweaks
data-category-tweaks-v2.description: Provides tweaks for the Data ("Variables") block category.

settings.name: Move data blocks above variables list

mute-project.name: Muted project player mode
mute-project.description: Ctrl+Click the green flag to mute/unmute the project.

info.text: On macOS, use the Cmd key instead of the Ctrl key.

disable-auto-save.name: Disable auto-save
disable-auto-save.description: Disables the automatic saving of projects while editing.

info.text: This will disable all types of project autosaving. Make sure to manually save your changes frequently to avoid losing them.

hide-flyout.name: Auto-hiding block palette
hide-flyout.description: Hides the block palette if not hovered. Click the lock icon to lock it in place temporarily. Alternatively, use "category click" mode.

info.text: "Palette area hover" mode only extends the viewing area. If you want to be able to drag blocks into that area without them getting trashed, use one of the other modes.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: This addon was revised and many bugs were fixed.

comments-linebreaks.name: Line breaks in comments
comments-linebreaks.description: Makes line breaks (pressing Enter) in comments on the website visible instead of converting them to spaces.

settings.name: Add scroll bars to tall comments

account-settings-capitalize.name: Capitalized Account Settings
account-settings-capitalize.description: Changes "Account settings" in the account menu to "Account Settings".

longer-wiwo.name: Higher character limit in "What I'm Working On"
longer-wiwo.description: Allows you to type 55 more characters in your profile's "What I'm Working On". Everyone on Scratch will see the extra characters.

show-bbcode.name: BBCode source button
show-bbcode.description: Adds a button to the forums that shows the BBCode source of a post.

copy-message-link.name: Copy link to comment button
copy-message-link.description: Adds a "Copy Link" button to all comments on the website, next to the "Report" button.

load-extensions.name: Automatically add extensions
load-extensions.description: Auto-shows music, pen, and other extensions in the block category menu in the editor.

variable-manager.name: Variable manager
variable-manager.description: Adds a tab next to "sounds" in the editor for easily updating variables and lists.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: List items can now be inserted without holding the Shift key.

scratchstats.name: Profile statistics
scratchstats.description: Shows statistics from ScratchDB on user profiles.

folders.name: Sprite folders
folders.description: Adds folders to the sprite pane, as well as costume and sound lists. To create a folder, right click any sprite and click "create folder". Click a folder to open or close it. Right click a sprite to see what folders you can move it to, or alternatively drag and drop it into an open folder. This feature works by adding "[folderName]//" at the beginning of the names for your sprites.

info.text: Users with this feature enabled will be able to see the folders in your project. Anyone else will see sprite lists normally (no folders).

message-filters.name: Message filters
message-filters.description: Lets you select filters for types of messages to hide or show on Scratch's messages page.

info.text: This does not change your message count. This simply lets you hide certain types of messages on Scratch's messages page.

block-palette-icons.name: Block palette category icons
block-palette-icons.description: Adds icons inside the colored circles that identify block categories.

custom-block-shape.name: Customizable block shape
custom-block-shape.description: Adjust the padding, corner radius, and notch height of blocks.

info.text: Decreasing the padding size is only visible to you, so when your projects are viewed by other users, your scripts may overlap.

presets.name: 3.0 Blocks
presets.description: The regular appearance of Scratch 3.0 blocks

presets.name: 2.0 Blocks
presets.description: An appearance similar to Scratch 2.0 blocks

presets.name: 3.0 Flat
presets.description: Scratch 3.0 blocks with notches and corners removed

presets.name: 2.0 Flat
presets.description: Scratch 2.0 blocks with notches and corners removed

2d-color-picker.name: 2D color picker
2d-color-picker.description: Replaces saturation and brightness sliders in the costume editor with a 2D color picker. Hold Shift while dragging the cursor to change the values on a single axis.

drag-drop.name: File drag and drop
drag-drop.description: Lets you drag images and sounds from your file manager into the sprite pane or costume/sound list. You can also drag text files into lists or "ask and wait" question inputs.

dango-rain.name: Dango rain on profiles (April Fools Day)
dango-rain.description: Users that include the word "dango" on their "About Me" will have dango emojis raining on the sides of their profile.

info.text: Only Scratch Addons users with this enabled will see the dango rain.

initialise-sprite-position.name: Customizable new sprite position
initialise-sprite-position.description: Change the default x/y position of new sprites.

settings.name: Randomize the position of library sprites

potentialValues.name: Keep the same as the original sprite

custom-zoom.name: Customizable code area zoom
custom-zoom.description: Choose custom settings for the minimum, maximum, speed, and start size of the zoom of scripts in the code area, and autohide the controls.

blocks2image.name: Save blocks as image
blocks2image.description: Right click the code area to export blocks as SVG/PNG images.

editor-sounds.name: Editor sound effects
editor-sounds.description: Plays sound effects when you connect or delete blocks.

transparent-orphans.name: Block transparency
transparent-orphans.description: Adjust the transparency for blocks in the editor, with separate options for orphaned blocks (those without a hat block at the top) and blocks that are being dragged.

gamepad.name: Gamepad support
gamepad.description: Interact with projects using a USB or Bluetooth controller/gamepad.

settings.name: Hide settings button when no controllers detected

remove-curved-stage-border.name: Remove curved stage border
remove-curved-stage-border.description: Removes the curved border around the stage, allowing you to see the corners.

fix-pasted-scripts.name: Do not automatically run duplicated blocks
fix-pasted-scripts.description: Fixes a bug in the Scratch editor, where duplicating a block and attaching it to a script causes the script to run.

better-img-uploads.name: HD image uploads
better-img-uploads.description: Adds a new button above the "upload costume" button that automatically converts uploaded bitmap images into SVG (vector) images to avoid losing quality.

info.text: Avoid using the HD upload button if you plan to edit the image after uploading.

ctrl-click-run-scripts.name: Ctrl+Click to run scripts
ctrl-click-run-scripts.description: Only run scripts on click if also holding the Ctrl key.

info.text: On macOS, use the Cmd key instead of the Ctrl key.

redirect-mobile-forums.name: Redirect to standard forums
redirect-mobile-forums.description: Redirects you to the standard ("main") forums when you click a link to the mobile forums.

expanding-search-bar.name: Expandable search bar
expanding-search-bar.description: Makes the search bar in the navigation bar wider when it's focused.

debugger.name: Debugger
debugger.description: Adds a new "debugger" window to the editor. Allows for logging into the "Logs" tab of the debugger window using the "log", "warn" and "error" blocks. The "breakpoint" block will pause the project when executed. All running threads can be viewed in the "Threads" tab of the debugger, and when paused the "Step" button can be used to execute the next block. A graph of frames per second and number of clones can be viewed in the "Performance" tab.

settings.name: Log when max list length exceeded

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: New "Threads" and "Performance" tabs in the debugger window.

disable-stage-drag-select.name: Non-draggable sprites in editor
disable-stage-drag-select.description: Removes the ability to drag sprites around on the stage in the editor, except those explicitly set as draggable. Hold Shift while dragging a sprite to move it normally.

studio-followers.name: Browse followers button in studios
studio-followers.description: Adds a button at the top of the "curators" tab in studios you manage, that lists your followers and followed users and lets you invite a shown user with a single click.

forum-toolbar.name: More forum toolbar buttons
forum-toolbar.description: Adds buttons in the forum editing toolbar to insert BBCode tags, such as [center] or [color].

items-per-row.name: More items per row
items-per-row.description: Lets you change the number of items displayed in a single row in a grid of projects, studios, or users.

settings.name: Project remixes, user shared and favorite projects
Project studios, user curated and followed studios

default-project.name: Customizable default project
default-project.description: Change the default project from the Scratch Cat to any existing project.

turbowarp-player.name: TurboWarp button
turbowarp-player.description: Adds a button on project pages to play the project in TurboWarp.org, next to the Remix button.

info.text: "Replace player" mode changes the Scratch player to a TurboWarp embed, which doesn't support seeing inside projects.
TurboWarp has separate cloud data servers. "Replace player" mode will send your Scratch username to TurboWarp.org for use in cloud data.

ctrl-enter-post.name: Ctrl+Enter to post
ctrl-enter-post.description: Automatically posts the comment or forum post on Ctrl+Enter.

info.text: On macOS, you can also use the Cmd key.

no-script-bumping.name: Do not automatically space overlapping scripts
no-script-bumping.description: Allows scripts to be moved and modified without causing overlapping scripts to move around.

user-id.name: Show user IDs
user-id.description: Adds the user ID next to the username at the top of profile pages.

hide-delete-button.name: Hide delete button
hide-delete-button.description: Hides delete button (trash can icon) from sprites, costumes and sounds. They can still be deleted using the right click context menu.

name-backpack-items.name: Name scripts before placing in backpack
name-backpack-items.description: Asks you to name scripts after you drag them into the backpack, instead of using the default name "code".

forum-copy-code.name: Copy code button on forums
forum-copy-code.description: Adds a "copy code" button above code boxes in forum posts that copies the contents into the clipboard.

paint-by-default.name: Paint costume by default
paint-by-default.description: Changes the default action of "Choose a Sprite/Costume/Backdrop/Sound" buttons, which open the library by default.

editor-unshare-button.name: Unshare button in editor
editor-unshare-button.description: Replaces the "Shared" button next to the project title box with a button to unshare the project.

hide-project-stats.name: Hide project stats
hide-project-stats.description: Lets you hide love, favorite, remix, comment, and view counts on project pages, the front page, and My Stuff.

settings.name: Hide love count in "What the Community is Loving"
Hide remix count in "What the Community is Remixing"
Show stats on my own project pages

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: The padding between statistics has been fixed, there is now an option to show statistics on your own projects, and the My Stuff page is now supported.

editor-extra-keys.name: Extra key support
editor-extra-keys.description: Adds more keys to the "key () pressed?" and "when () key pressed" block dropdowns, such as enter, dot, comma, and more.

info.text: The "experimental keys" include equals, slash, semicolon and more. They may not work on all operating systems or keyboard layouts.

The "Shift keys" include keys which typically require the Shift key and a number key, like hashtag, exclamation mark and more. These keys only work with the "when () key pressed" block and do not work on all operating systems or keyboard layouts.

remix-button.name: Remix button in own projects
remix-button.description: Adds the Remix button to your own projects.

forum-id.name: Quote post number
forum-id.description: Click the "quote post number" button to include a link to the post in your reply.

settings.name: Automatically add post link to quotes

block-cherry-picking.name: Grab single block with Ctrl key
block-cherry-picking.description: Adds the ability to drag a single block out of the middle of a script (instead of the entire stack attached below it) while holding the Ctrl key.

info.text: On macOS, use the Cmd key instead of the Ctrl key.
If "flip controls" is enabled, grabbing blocks individually will be the default behavior. Hold Ctrl to drag the entire stack.

hide-new-variables.name: Hide new variables
hide-new-variables.description: Do not automatically create monitors for newly created variables or lists.

move-to-top-bottom.name: Move costume to top or bottom
move-to-top-bottom.description: Adds options to the right click context menu for costumes and sounds to move them to the top or the bottom of the list.

info.text: This addon was previously part of the "developer tools" addon but has moved here.

search-my-stuff.name: Search bar on My Stuff
search-my-stuff.description: Allows you to search your projects, studios, and trash on the My Stuff page. Simply start typing anywhere on the page to start a search. You can also use Ctrl+Enter after searching to quickly open the top search result.

info.text: If you have a lot of projects or studios, the search might take a while.

fullscreen.name: Enhanced full screen
fullscreen.description: Fixes some undesired effects in the project player's full screen mode, opens it in your browser's full screen mode, and hides the green flag toolbar.

info.text: If you choose to hide the toolbar, remember that you can use the Esc key to exit the project player's full screen mode.

settings.name: Open full screen project player in full screen browser mode

echo-effect.name: Echo effect button
echo-effect.description: Brings back the Echo button in the sound editor.

block-duplicate.name: Duplicate script with Alt key
block-duplicate.description: Quickly duplicate a script by dragging it while holding the Alt key. Hold Ctrl as well to only duplicate a single block instead of the entire stack attached below it.

info.text: On macOS, use the Option key instead of the Alt key and Command key instead of the Control key.

disable-paste-offset.name: Do not shift pasted items
disable-paste-offset.description: Paste copied items at their original position instead of shifted slightly in the costume editor.

emoji-picker.name: Emoji picker for comments
emoji-picker.description: Adds a button to insert emojis to comments on the website.

editor-comment-previews.name: Editor comment previews
editor-comment-previews.description: Allows you to preview the contents of comments by hovering over collapsed comments and blocks. You can use this to view comments that are off-screen, identify a loop block from the bottom by its preview, fit many long comments in a small space, and more.

settings.name: Hover blocks to preview attached comments
Hover custom blocks to preview definition comments

swap-local-global.name: Switch variables between "For all sprites" and "For this sprite only"
swap-local-global.description: Adds more options when renaming an existing variable or list: allows changing between "For all sprites" and "For this sprite only" and whether variables are stored in the cloud. Also adds a new option when right clicking a variable/list to quickly change its scope.

fix-editor-comments.name: Better editor comments
fix-editor-comments.description: Makes numerous changes to comments in the Scratch editor: fixes a bug where comments attached to blocks don't save their positions correctly after dragging, prevents block comments from spawning off-screen in large scripts, keeps block comment connections straight, and more.

settings.name: Add scroll bars to clipped comments
Always spawn block comments next to block

tutorials-button.name: Hide Tutorials button
tutorials-button.description: Hides the Tutorials button in the editor menu bar.

hi-res-thumbnails.name: High resolution thumbnails
hi-res-thumbnails.description: Replaces thumbnails across the website with higher resolution images. Useful for Retina (high pixel density) displays and browsing at greater than 100% zoom.

info.text: If your network's data plan is limited, keep in mind that higher resolution images require more data usage.

block-count.name: Block count
block-count.description: Shows the total number of blocks in a project in the editor menu bar. Previously part of "sprite and script count".

script-snap.name: Snap scripts to grid
script-snap.description: Drag a script to automatically align its position to the code area dots.

color-inputs.name: Color picker inputs
color-inputs.description: Allows setting an exact value (0-100) for each slider in the costume editor color picker.

custom-block-text.name: Customizable block text style
custom-block-text.description: Changes the thickness of the text on blocks and optionally adds a text shadow.

search-sprites.name: Search sprites by name
search-sprites.description: Adds a search box to the sprite pane to search for sprites by name.

hide-signatures.name: Hide signatures on forums
hide-signatures.description: Hides signatures in forum posts and adds a "Show signature" button.

disable-sprite-wobble.name: Disable sprite wobble in sprite pane
disable-sprite-wobble.description: Allow scripts, costumes, and sounds to be moved to different sprites without the sprites moving around within the sprite pane.

forum-live-preview.name: Live forum post preview
forum-live-preview.description: Automatically shows a preview when you stop typing while writing or editing a forum post.

sounds-duration.name: Sound duration display
sounds-duration.description: Adds a display to the sound editor that shows the total length and the elapsed time of the sound, or the selection within it.

default-costume-editor-color.name: Customizable default costume editor colors
default-costume-editor-color.description: Changes the default colors and outline size used by the costume editor.

settings.name: Use previous color instead of resetting after switching tools

one-click-studio-invites.name: One-click studio invites
one-click-studio-invites.description: Accept studio invites directly from Scratch's messages page. An accept button will appear below studio invite messages.

opacity-slider.name: Opacity slider
opacity-slider.description: Adds an opacity slider to the costume editor color picker.

info.text: The opacity slider is disabled when no object is selected, or when in bitmap mode.

remove-search-bar-autocomplete.name: Remove autocomplete from search bar
remove-search-bar-autocomplete.description: Stops web browsers from autocompleting suggestions in the navigation bar's search bar.

zebra-striping.name: Alternating nested block colors
zebra-striping.description: Makes blocks of the same category alternate between lighter and darker shades when nested inside each other. This is also known as zebra striping.

find-bar.name: Editor find bar
find-bar.description: Adds a find bar to find and jump to scripts, costumes and sounds next to the sounds tab. Use Ctrl+Left and Ctrl+Right in the code area to navigate to previous or next visited position after using the find bar.

info.text: This addon was previously part of the "developer tools" addon but has moved here.

jump-to-def.name: Jump to custom block definition
jump-to-def.description: Allows you to jump to a custom block's definition using the middle mouse button or Shift+Click on the block.

info.text: This addon was previously part of the "developer tools" addon but has moved here.

vol-slider.name: Project volume slider
vol-slider.description: Adds a volume slider next to the green flag controls.

pick-colors-from-stage.name: Select stage colors in the costume editor
pick-colors-from-stage.description: Allows the costume editor's eye dropper to also pick colors from the stage.

rename-broadcasts.name: Rename broadcasts
rename-broadcasts.description: Adds an option to rename broadcasts in the broadcast blocks' dropdowns.

dark-www.name: Website dark mode and customizable colors
dark-www.description: Customize colors used by the Scratch website. Multiple dark themes by different authors available. If you don't need dark mode but want to change the default colors you can select the "Scratch's default colors" preset and tweak it.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: You can now completely customize the appearance of the Scratch website.

settings.name: Dark code blocks on the forums

presets.name: "Experimental" Dark
presets.description: A dark theme by Maximouse based on a userstyle. Not experimental

presets.name: Scratch's default colors
presets.description: The colors normally used by Scratch

scratchr2.name: Scratch 2.0 â†’ 3.0
scratchr2.description: Makes Scratch 2.0-styled pages look like Scratch 3.0.

old-studio-layout.name: Old studio layout
old-studio-layout.description: Reverts the layout of the studio page back to the one used before the studio update or the one previously available as part of the Scratch 2.0 â†’ 3.0 addon.

info.text: This addon doesn't work well on mobile devices and in small windows.
The size of most elements is not changed. If you want to see more projects and curators at once, use the "more items per row" addon.

compact-messages.name: Compact messages
compact-messages.description: Makes Scratch's messages page more compact and easier to read.

customize-avatar-border.name: Customizable profile picture border
customize-avatar-border.description: Allows you to hide or change the outline around profile pictures in project and studio comments.

scratchblocks.name: 3.0 Scratchblocks on forums
scratchblocks.description: Enables the new version of scratchblocks on the forums.

info.text: The built-in post preview does not support this addon.

better-featured-project.name: Profile page banner
better-featured-project.description: Turns the featured project on any user's profile into a nice-looking banner.

material-forum-editor-buttons.name: Better forum post editor buttons
material-forum-editor-buttons.description: Changes the icons for buttons in the forum post editor from pixelated bitmaps to Material icons.

forum-quote-code-beautifier.name: Customizable quotes and code blocks on forums
forum-quote-code-beautifier.description: Shows nicer code and quote blocks on the forums.

horizontal-mystuff-tabs.name: Horizontal tabs on My Stuff
horizontal-mystuff-tabs.description: Moves the My Stuff navigation buttons ("All Projects", "My Studios", "Trash") to the top of the page, instead of keeping them on the left.

editor-dark-mode.name: Editor dark mode and customizable colors
editor-dark-mode.description: Customize colors used by the project editor. Multiple dark themes by different authors available. If you don't need dark mode but want to change the default colors you can select the "Scratch's default colors" preset and tweak it.

settings.name: Change the costume editor background and selection borders
Change the colors of variables, lists, speech bubbles, and answer inputs on the stage

presets.name: 3.Darker
presets.description: A dark theme based on a userscript by infinitytec

presets.name: 3.Dark
presets.description: A dark blue theme based on a userscript by infinitytec

presets.name: Dark Editor
presets.description: A dark theme based on a userstyle by _nix

presets.name: "Experimental" Dark
presets.description: A dark theme by Maximouse based on a userstyle. Not experimental

presets.name: TurboWarp Dark
presets.description: A dark theme based on TurboWarp's dark mode.

presets.name: Scratch 2.0
presets.description: A theme based on Scratch 2.0's colors.

presets.name: Scratch 1.x
presets.description: A theme based on Scratch 1.x's colors.

presets.name: Scratch's default colors
presets.description: The colors normally used by Scratch

editor-colored-context-menus.name: Colored context menus
editor-colored-context-menus.description: Makes block right click context menus colorful.

hide-stage.name: Hide stage and sprite pane
hide-stage.description: Adds a button next to the "small stage" and "large stage" buttons that hides the stage and the sprite pane, making the code area much larger.

editor-stage-left.name: Display stage on left side
editor-stage-left.description: Moves the stage to the left side of the editor, like in Scratch 2.0.

info.text: To change the position of buttons above the stage, use the "reverse order of project controls" addon.

editor-buttons-reverse-order.name: Reverse order of project controls
editor-buttons-reverse-order.description: Moves the green flag and stop buttons to the right and the full screen button to the left, like in Scratch 2.0.

columns.name: Two-column category menu
columns.description: Splits the block category menu into two columns and moves it to the top of the block palette, like in Scratch 2.0.

editor-theme3.name: Customizable block colors
editor-theme3.description: Edit block colors for each category in the editor.

latestUpdate.temporaryNotice: The "Dark comments" setting from "Editor dark mode and customizable colors" has been moved here and is now customizable.

settings.name: Change the colors of blocks in the forums

presets.name: 3.0 Tweaks
presets.description: Events, Control, and Custom blocks with 2.0 inspired colors

presets.name: 2.0 Colors
presets.description: The original block colors from Scratch 2.0

presets.name: Dark
presets.description: Dark versions of the default colors
